塗り薬: (ぬりぐすり) - medical cream; ointment; salve; liniment
塗り込む: (ぬりこむ) - to paint over heavily; to plaster up
塗り隠す: (ぬりかくす) - to cover with paint; to hide with paint or make-up
塗る: (nuru) - pintar, rebocar, envernizar, envernizar, espalhar, esfregar, colocar (papel de parede)
塗れる: (まぶれる) - to be smeared; to be covered
塗固める: (ぬりかためる) - to coat a surface with something that adheres strongly when hardened (i.e. grout, plaster, lacquer)
塗壁: (ぬりかべ) - plaster or mortar-covered wall
塗擦: (とさつ) - rubbing an ointment into the skin
塗替える: (ぬりかえる) - to repaint/to paint again; to break (a record)/to rewrite/to remake
塗板: (ぬりいた) - (塗り板 is now obs.)  blackboard; (ぬりいた only) board used for laquering
塗炭の苦しみ: (とたんのくるしみ) - misery; distress
塗笠: (ぬりがさ) - traditional lacquered conical hat
塗篭: (ぬりごめ) - interior closed room with heavily plastered walls in a Heian palace
塗籠: (ぬりごめ) - interior closed room with heavily plastered walls in a Heian palace
塗薬: (ぬりぐすり) - medical cream; ointment; salve; liniment
塚: (tsuka) - colina, monte, monte, colina; monte funerário, túmulo, tumulus, monte tumular
塚を築く: (つかをきずく) - to pile up a mound
塚造: (ツカツクリ) - megapode (any bird of family Megapodiidae, incl. brush turkeys and mallee fowl); mound builder
塞がり: (ふたがり) - being closed/being blocked up/being occupied/hindrance/impedance; unlucky direction (in Onmyoudou; due to the presence of a god such as Ten'ichijin)
塞がる: (ふたがる) - to be closed/to be blocked/to be healed (e.g. wound)/to be shut up; to be clogged/to be plugged up; to be occupied/to be taken (e.g. accommodation)
塞き止める: (せきとめる) - to dam up/to hold back/to keep back/to bring to a halt/to intercept; to stem (an activity)/to check (e.g. progress)
塞ぎ込む: (ふさぎこむ) - to mope; to brood; to be in low spirits; to have the blues
塞ぐ: (ふさぐ) - to stop up/to close up/to block (up)/to plug up/to shut up/to cover (ears, eyes, etc.)/to close (eyes, mouth); to stand in the way/to obstruct; to occupy/to fill up/to take up; to perform one's role/to do one's duty; to feel depressed/to mope
塞げる: (ふさげる) - to close up; to block up; to fill; to cover
塞栓: (そくせん) - embolus; abnormal substance (i.e. air) circulating in the blood
塞源: (そくげん) - blockage of a source
塡める: (はめる) - to insert/to put in (such that there is a snug fit)/to button/to put on (something that envelops, e.g. gloves, ring); to have sex/to fuck; to pigeonhole (into a particular category); to place a ring-shaped object around something (esp. one that restricts freedom, such as handcuffs); to entrap/to set someone up (i.e. frame them for a crime, etc.)
塩: (pt/shio) - salt , salt (i.e. sodium chloride), common salt, table salt; salt (e.g. sodium chloride, calcium sulfate, etc.); toil, trouble; saltiness
塩っぱい: (しょっぱい) - salty; calculating/stingy; scowling/grimacing/frowning; hoarse
塩に漬ける: (しおにつける) - to preserve in salt
塩もみ: (しおもみ) - sprinkling salt on a raw vegetable and rubbing it in
塩をかける: (しおをかける) - to sprinkle salt on; to salt
塩をする: (しおをする) - to sprinkle salt on; to salt
塩を掛ける: (しおをかける) - to sprinkle salt on; to salt
